EmailTemplate.subject: Your EMS CAM Connection Newsletter - February 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
February 2012 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Feb12_Main.html) Welcome to the February issue of your Client Account Manager (CAM) Connection from the EMS Solution's division of TriTech Sofware Systems. After February, we will be changing publication of this newsletter to a quarterly basis. Product announcements and technical advisories will continue to be sent by Technical Services in a timely manner.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Feb12_AlertUpdates.html)
> HIPAA 5010 Upgrade Update
> Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Released for General Availability
> Free NAAC CEU Offerings and Discounted NAAC Certified Ambulance Coder Course for TriTech Customers
Products & Services (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Feb12_ProductsServices.html)
> Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Release: System Dashboard, Remittance Advice, HIPAA 5010
> Group Training for Sweet Billing Users Offered in Rockford, Illinois
Technical Support Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Feb12_TechnicalSupportHotTopics.html)
> Coffee with Kelly Topics for January
Client News & Go Lives (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Feb12_ClientGoLives.html)
> Congratulations Flagger County Paramedics! National Champs - AGAIN!
> Largest Ambulance Service in Western Oklahoma Catches up on Backlog with Fusion ePCR
